cognitive_context.problem_understanding: SRS Website needs strategic positioning analysis to understand how to differentiate in an AI-disrupted resume services market. Owner requested contrarian analysis to challenge conventional wisdom and identify overlooked opportunities. Additionally, homepage hero copy needed optimization for conversion, and blog typography required fixes.

attempted_solutions.approach: Multi-agentic website audit with 6 specialized agents
attempted_solutions.outcome: Success - produced 15-page audit matrix with scores
Success - identified 15 missed issues, revised scores
Success - 967-line report with evidence-backed and speculative views

attempted_solutions.approach: Hero copy optimization with conversion psychology
attempted_solutions.outcome: Success - new copy implemented, pending owner approval
Success - prose styling now works, .blog-content class added

key_insights: AI is creating demand for verification, not eliminating it - SRS's 'Client Truth Principle' is exactly what the market needs
Premium pricing may be more defensible in trust markets, not less
Small business advantages in trust-dependent services outweigh scale disadvantages
ATS optimization is table stakes, not a differentiator anymore
The 'fiction' to 'friction' typo was causing confusion - now fixed across 4 files

dead_ends.reason: Free tier requires IPv4 add-on for direct connections

assumptions: Owner prefers thorough documentation over speed
Staging branch will be reviewed before merging to main
Multi-agentic workflow is appropriate for complex analysis tasks
SRS positioning should differentiate from AI tools, not compete with them
uncertainties: Which strategic path (A, B, or C) owner will choose
Whether hero copy resonates with target audience
Actual client acquisition sources (needed for strategic decisions)

modified_files.app/page.tsx: Hero section updated with new copy emphasizing human-led, research-backed positioning
modified_files.app/about/page.tsx: Fixed 'fiction' to 'friction' typo in Client Truth Principle quote
modified_files.app/blog/[slug]/page.tsx: Added TableOfContents component, fixed content width
modified_files.lib/blog/posts.ts: Fixed typo, updated CTAs with Client Truth Principle messaging

technical_debt_added: Staging and prototype directories contain outdated 'fiction' wording
No automated tests for new components

decision_log.decision: Use feature branch instead of main for uncommitted work
decision_log.rationale: Vercel auto-deploys from main; staging branch prevents accidental production deployment

decision_log.decision: Deploy 6-agent multi-agentic workflow for website audit
decision_log.rationale: Complex analysis benefits from specialized agents with different perspectives
Systematic verification catches errors and increases confidence
Owner requested analysis to challenge conventional wisdom about AI disruption
Differentiates from AI tools, addresses market concern

immediate_tasks: Commit handoff documentation to staging branch
Owner review of contrarian strategic analysis
investigation_needed: Where do actual clients come from? (Google/Referrals/LinkedIn/Other)
What is current conversion rate baseline?
Which path (A/B/C) aligns with business model?
blocked_items: Merge to main (blocked by owner approval)
